name: Abandoned Temple
description:
Play as a Wizard and a Knight and explore through what was once thought to be an abandoned temple, fight off the cultists who have taken over and fix up the place.

Controls:

WASD movement;

Space to jump;

E to interact;

R to ranged attack;

Q to melee attack;

Escape to pause;

Y to change character (when facing other character)

Right click to aim character;

Left click to tell ally to go to this location;
